text: Ejen Ali (translated as Agent Ali) is a Malaysian animated spy-fiction franchise created by Wau Animation and Primeworks Studios. It has a television series containing 39 episodes spanning 3 seasons and 2 movies. ==Synopsis== The series is set in the fictional Malaysian city of Cyberaya. Ali Ghazali is a 12-year-old boy that serves as an agent to solve missions, along with Alicia and Bakar. He is also a student in SRT Cyberaya. The series revolves around Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA) where they train agents to fight criminals and do secretive missions. ==Related pages== *List of programming blocks Category:Animated television series
title: Ejen Ali
